name: VTS Software
tagline: A boutique bespoke software development company
description: VTS Software is a software development company founded back in 2007. We are offering a bespoke software development services covering anything from Mobile Apps,  Windows and MacOS desktop applications to a development of an enterprise grade Business Intelligence solutions . We are located in Manchester, United Kingdom but we are supporting our clients globally. VTS is a certified Silver Microsoft Partner in Application Development.
